name: RING, RING !!!
description:
RING, RING !!!

In RING, RING !!! you must hold a call for as long as you can by creating as many combos as you can with your cards.

HOW TO PLAY:

☎️ Hold left click on the mouse to pick up and drag your cards.

☎️ Release the left click on the spaces on the table to drop your cards and create your combo.

☎️ Press the combo button that appears when you have more than two cards on the table to deliver the combo and gain more time.

Or

☎️ Drag just a card to the alien for saving a little bit of time
